attributes.additional_details: Nationalising energy and water and making it free will greatly benefit the citizens of the UK as there are no bills to pay , this will make the current cost of living crisis go down or even eradicate this issue. By eradicating the cost of living crisis , the citizens will be happy and the government can focus more on solving other issues , like crime and further improve and develop the country. The government can afford this by taxing the rich and any large businesses/corporations.
attributes.background: The government should nationalise water and energy for households. This will prevent any high energy/water bills. We can fund for this by taxing the wealthy people of this country.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621658
